trans-unit.source: Represents a labeled statement or a stand-alone label.
trans-unit.target: 表示的标记的语句或独立标签。

trans-unit.source: CodeLabeledStatement represents a label and optionally, an associated statement.
trans-unit.target: CodeLabeledStatement 表示一个标签和 （可选） 相关联的语句。

trans-unit.source: A label can be used to indicate the target of a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement>.
trans-unit.target: 标签可用于指示的目标的一种<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement>。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeGotoStatement>

trans-unit.source: To create only a label, leave the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A> property uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建仅标签，将保留<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A>属性未初始化。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement.Statement%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Not all languages support `goto` statements and labels, so you should test wheter a code generator supports `goto` statements and labels by calling the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A> method with the <xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport> flag.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 并非所有语言都支持`goto`语句和标签，因此你应的指示代码生成器支持`goto`语句和标签通过调用<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>方法替换<xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport>标志。</xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport> </xref:System.CodeDom.Compiler.ICodeGenerator.Supports%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class using the specified label name.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref>类使用的指定的标签名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref> class using the specified label name and statement.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement"></xref>类使用的指定的标签名称和语句。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> to associate with the label.
Gets or sets the name of the label.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置标签的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the optional associated statement.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可选相关联的语句。

trans-unit.source: If this property is not set, the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement> represents only a label, rather than a labeled statement.
trans-unit.target: 如果未设置此属性，<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>表示仅一个标签，而不是标记的语句。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeLabeledStatement>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"></xref> that indicates the statement associated with the label.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeStatement"> </xref> ，该值指示与标签关联的语句。
